alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 23 at 11:28PM CDT until September 23 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LATIMER AND CENTRAL PITTSBURG COUNTIES... At 1127 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Krebs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Hartshorne... Krebs... Crowder... Alderson... Higgins... Blocker... Yanush... Mcalester Regional Airport... Blanco... Haileyville... Gowen... Dow... Bache... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm has had a history of producing very large hail and wind damage. This is a dangerous storm!
